creator: Jack London
description:
LibriVox recording of Before Adam by Jack London.
Read in English by Tom Weiss

The writer who lives in the current world has dreams and nightmares that he relives the pre-stoneage life of one of his proto-human ancestors. Summary to be modified during and at the completion of the recording by the Reader. - (Summary by Tom Weiss)

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;stone age; pre-historic
title: Before Adam
